item.title: Posh Answers and Knowledge Assistant searches are failing
item.description:
Jul 8, 19:24 EDT
Resolved - This issue is resolved. Posh Answers and Knowledge Assistants have returned to normal operation.

Jul 8, 19:16 EDT
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented. Next update in 1 hour or sooner if the status changes.

Jul 8, 18:36 EDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue that is causing our knowledge products to not respond to queries. We will update this incident in 1 hour or sooner if there is a change in status.

item.title: Posh Digital and Voice Assistants are offline
item.description:
Jul 1, 13:47 EDT
Resolved - This incident is now resolved.

Jul 1, 10:15 EDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented to resolve the issue, we are currently monitoring the systems.

Jul 1, 10:13 EDT
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Jul 1, 10:02 EDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue that is affecting the majority of our Digital and Voice assistants. We will provide another update within 30 minutes or sooner.

item.title: Posh Platform Maintenance
item.description:
Jun 17, 04:30 EDT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jun 17, 03:00 EDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 10, 09:51 EDT
Scheduled - Posh will be performing maintenance on Tuesday, June 17th 2025 from 3:00 AM to 4:30 AM ET to complete essential infrastructure updates. During this time, all Posh Products may experience short outages of several minutes in length during the 90 minute window.

item.title: Cloud Provider issues
item.description:
Jun 12, 16:36 EDT
Resolved - This is now resolved, there have been no signs of the earlier issues for the last hour.

Jun 12, 15:39 EDT
Monitoring - Our cloud provider has advised that all services have recovered. We are continuing to monitor to be sure this is the case.

Jun 12, 14:42 EDT
Investigating - Our cloud provider is currently experiencing wide-spread latency and network-related issues across all of their customers. The Posh platform is experiencing degraded performance.

item.title: Posh Answers and Digital Assistants not loading
item.description:
May 22, 13:00 EDT
Resolved - All instances of Posh Answers and a portion of the Posh Digital Assistants were offline from 12:54pm to 2:57pm EDT today.

item.title: Posh Digital Assistants - error when a Suggestion is selected
item.description:
May 2, 11:52 EDT
Resolved - This issue has been resolved. The issue started at 11:22AM ET on 5/1/25 and was resolved at 10:55AM ET today, 5/2/25.

May 2, 11:02 EDT
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results. All testing so far indicates that the issue is resolved.

May 2, 10:50 EDT
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented. Next update in 1 hour or sooner if there is a change in status.

May 2, 10:40 EDT
Investigating - We are investigating an issue that is affecting a majority of the Digital Assistants (Banking, Mobile, and Web) that causes an error message when a Suggestion is selected in the chat.

Apr 2, 21:00 EDT

item.title: Posh Voice Assistants - some calls not completing
item.description:
Mar 31, 19:03 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Mar 31, 17:27 EDT
Update - Posh Voice Assistants continue to operate normally. Our telephony provider continues to monitor for system stability. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as further information becomes available.

Mar 31, 15:27 EDT
Update - Our service provider has completed their updates, and is currently monitoring. Posh continues to monitor as well.

We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information is available.

Mar 31, 13:59 EDT
Monitoring - Posh continues to monitor while we wait for our service provider to complete their updates. We have not seen any errors in the last hour and will continue to monitor until the we receive a notice of resolution from our provider.

Mar 31, 12:59 EDT
Update - Our telephony service provider has identified the issue and has begun implementing the fix. We are no longer seeing errors for our Voice Assistants. We will continue to monitor until we receive notification that this has been fully resolved. Next update in 1 hour or sooner if the status is updated by our provider.

Mar 31, 12:17 EDT
Investigating - A small number of Posh Voice Assistants are being adversely affected by an underlying issue with our telephony service provider that is causing calls to fail. We expect another update from our provider within the next hour or sooner if there is a change in status.

item.title: Posh Answers and Knowledge Assistant offline
item.description:
Jan 24, 18:34 EST
Resolved - We discovered an issue with our Knowledge Assistant and Posh Answers products this evening that was causing all searches to fail. This issue started at 5:09pm, was reported at approximately 5:30pm, and resolved at 6:20pm (All times in EST).

Dec 11, 18:00 EST
Resolved - Due to one of our critical frontier AI / LLM model partners having an outage, our Answers and Knowledge Assistant products were unable to respond to questions between 6:16pm and 8:40pm EST on December 11th.

item.title: Posh Portal: Insights & Chat Logs Maintenance
item.description:
Jul 8, 03:00 EDT
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jul 7, 23:00 EDT
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jul 2, 14:39 EDT
Scheduled - We will be performing routine maintenance on the Posh Portal on Sunday 7/7/24 overnight from 11pm Eastern on 7/7 to 3am Eastern on 7/8. The only pages impacted will be Insights and Chat Logs. All other pages (Coverage Gaps, Content Studio, Bot Configuration, Users) will not be impacted. If you do go to the Insights or Chat Logs pages during maintenance, data will not load on the page.

As this only impacts a portion of the Posh Portal, all Assistants will be fully operational during this maintenance period.

We will send notifications 1 hour before as a reminder, once maintenance starts, and then once it is completed.

item.title: Posh Voice Assistants - degraded performance for 13 minutes
item.description:
Jul 2, 07:52 EDT
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Jul 1, 17:24 EDT
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Jul 1, 15:14 EDT
Update - We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.

Jul 1, 13:21 EDT
Monitoring - We found a period of high latency that was caused by an oversubscribed resource in our environment. We will be performing emergency maintenance at 3AM ET on 7/2 to add additional resources.

Jul 1, 11:33 EDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating an issue that occurred in our voice infrastructure that started at 11:13am ET and lasted for 13 minutes.

item.title: Google Text To Speech issues
item.description:
Jun 23, 08:18 EDT
Resolved - This incident is resolved.

Jun 22, 17:36 EDT
Update - Twilio continues to monitor, next update expected in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Jun 22, 16:22 EDT
Monitoring - Posh received an update from Twilio that TTS using Google TTS Voice is now operating normally. Twilio will continue to monitor for system stability and will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Jun 22, 15:48 EDT
Investigating - Posh has received a notification from Twilio that they are investigating an issue with Google TTS that could affect Posh Voice Assistants. Twilio is still investigating at this point, with another update expected within an hour. We will update this incident as we receive updates from Twilio.

item.title: Posh Portal Impaired
item.description:
Apr 30, 14:09 EDT
Resolved - We have resolved the issue.

Apr 30, 13:48 EDT
Investigating - We are currently investigating issues with the Posh Portal including Knowledge Assistant. We will update this incident as we know more.
